price: 62. Wuxuuna, ku yidhi shaqaalahiisii: U dhex geliya badeecaddoodii rarkooda17, si ay u gartaan markay u noqdaan reerkooda (oo u tixgeliyaan) si ay u soo laabtaan.
arabic: وَقَالَ لِفِتۡيَٰنِهِ ٱجۡعَلُواْ بِضَٰعَتَهُمۡ فِي رِحَالِهِمۡ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَعۡرِفُونَهَآ إِذَا ٱنقَلَبُوٓاْ إِلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِهِمۡ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَرۡجِعُونَ
footnotes: 17. Badi mufasiriinta waxay sheegaan in badeecaddii Yuusuf walaalihi ay u keeneen inay ku beddeshaan raashinka ay aheyd hargo, xargo, iyo sandallo, iwm.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: waqāla lifit'yānihi ij'ʿalū biḍāʿatahum fī riḥālihim laʿallahum yaʿrifūnahā idhā inqalabū ilā ahlihim laʿallahum yarjiʿūna
